custom.title: Need a Custom Plan?
custom.description: If you have special requirements or higher transaction volumes, we can provide you with a customized solution.

questions.question: How do I choose the right plan for me?
questions.answer: You can choose a suitable plan based on your monthly transaction volume, required features, and budget. If you're unsure, you can start with the Basic plan and upgrade to a higher-tier plan later.

questions.question: Can I change my plan at any time?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. When upgrading, we will calculate the fee difference for the remaining time proportionally; when downgrading, the new price will take effect in the next billing cycle.

questions.question: How are transaction fees charged?
questions.answer: Transaction fees are deducted from the transaction amount when each transaction is completed. For example, if you process a $1,000 transaction using the Professional plan (1.5% fee), you will receive $985, and we will charge $15 as a fee.

questions.question: Is there a free trial period?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial period, allowing you to experience our service without paying. During the trial period, you can use all the features of the Professional plan, but with a transaction limit of $10,000.

questions.question: How do you handle situations where transaction volume exceeds the limit?
questions.answer: If your transaction volume approaches or exceeds the limit of your current plan, the system will automatically notify you. You can choose to upgrade to a higher-tier plan or contact our sales team for a custom plan. If you don't upgrade, transactions exceeding the limit will be suspended.

about.title: About Us

timeline.title: Founding
timeline.description: The company was founded by a group of technical experts and financial professionals passionate about blockchain technology, aiming to bridge the gap between traditional payments and cryptocurrencies.
